thread.title: Ryanair Reschedules Manchester Champions League FlightsTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Ryanair Reschedules Manchester Champions League FlightsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ryanair Reschedules Manchester Champions League FlightsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ryanair Reschedules Manchester Champions League Flights Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
Ryanair, announced that it has re-scheduled its Manchester – Dublin flights on three nights in September and November to allow Irish-based Manchester United fans to make match-day return trips for United’s three home Champions League games at Old Trafford.
Ryanair’s three Champions League flights will depart Manchester for Dublin at 23.45hrs on 3 Sep (Wolfsburg), 3 Nov (CSKA Moscow) and 25 Nov (PSV Eindhoven).
Seats are limited so Manchester United fans should log on to www.ryanair.com and book these Champions League Final specials as soon as possible to avoid disappointment.
Ryanair’s Robin Kiely said:
“Ryanair has re-scheduled these Manchester return flights to allow for Manchester United fans to make day-trips for the three Champions League home matches.
MAN UNITED CHAMPIONS LEAGUE SPECIAL RETURNS
Date Route Dept 30 Sep Manchester – Dublin 23.45hrs 3 Nov Manchester – Dublin 23.45hrs 25 Nov Manchester – Dublin 23.45hrs
